required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Randomized Assessment of Rapid Endovascular Treatment in Basilar Artery Occlusion Stroke in 115 Hospital
clinical_study.official_title: Randomized Assessment of Rapid Endovascular Treatment in Basilar Artery Occlusion Stroke in 115 Hospital

lead_sponsor.agency: Ho Chi Minh City University of Medicine and Pharmacy

clinical_study.source: Ho Chi Minh City University of Medicine and Pharmacy

brief_summary.textblock: This is a prospective, open lable studies conducted in 115 hospital to compare between thromboectomy and Recombinant Tisue Plasminogen Activator only to evaluate the eficacy and safety of endovascular treatment in basilar artery occlusion stroke patients

detailed_description.textblock: Acute basilar artery thrombosis is associated with a poor prognosis. Prevalence of basilar artery occlusion are not known. Although basilar artery occlusion has been reported in 2 per 1000 autopsy cases, basilar artery thrombosis may, in stroke registries, explain as many as 27% of ischemic strokes occurring in the posterior circulation.Various treatments were tried in groups of patients with vertebrobasilar territory infarction but evidence based was not cleared previous studies. Therefore, we conduct this study to evaluate the eficacy and safety of endovascular treatment in basilar artery occlusion stroke patients

primary_outcome.measure: NIHSS in patients wtih Basilar Artery Occlusion Stroke after 24hour admission
primary_outcome.description: NIHSS in patients wtih Basilar Artery Occlusion Stroke after 24hour admission

primary_outcome.measure: Survival rate in patients with Basilar Artery Occlusion Stroke
primary_outcome.description: Survival rate in patients with Basilar Artery Occlusion Stroke

secondary_outcome.measure: mRS in patients with Basilar Artery Occlusion Stroke
secondary_outcome.description: mRS in patients with Basilar Artery Occlusion Stroke

arm_group.description: use thromboectomy and rtpa for patient with basilar artery occlusion stroke in 24 hour
use rtpa for patient with basilar artery occlusion stroke in 24 hour

intervention.description: Thromboectomy in Basilar Artery Occlusion patients

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients admit to 115 hospital in 24h of Basilar Artery Occlusion Stroke
- NIHSS > 4 points
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients refuse to participate in studies
- Patients with contraindication of either rTPA or thromboectomy

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Ho Chi Minh City University of Medicine and Pharmacy
responsible_party.investigator_title: Randomized Assessment of Rapid Endovascular Treatment in Basilar Artery occlusion stroke in 115 hospital
